resources.string: Spread a word about BEEOK to all your friends. Clicking YES, assumes your approval to send a Promotional Email to ALL email contacts in your list.
Confirm Application Exit by pressing YES.
Call Blocker Feature : Feature available in Paid Version.

"
" "Version History :" "
" "===============" "
" "v1.0_2015-09-20 : Initial Promo App upload to GooglePlayStore with Facebook Login integrated."

"

" " BEEOK is aimed at users who wish to record phone conversations(both uplink & downlink side) or for taking voice notes in a class." "

"" How is it different from Other call recorders available in the market? (You may ask). Well, BEEOK sits in your phone completely silent, and comes to life when you get an Incoming call or make an Outgoing call." "

""The recorded file after the call is over is saved to Documents folder for later retrieval." "
""** BEEOK comes handy when you wish to take Voice notes, (say in a class or seminar or an interview)." "
""** BEEOK enables you to Block unwanted calls from Stalkers, Call Centres" "
""** BEEOK works even after you restart your phone."
"

"" We would love to hear from you, your feedback, suggestions & bugs(if any) to make BEEOK even better."
"

""e-mail: softwares.unleashed@gmail.com" "
""Web: www.softwaresunleashed.com" "
""Tweet Us: @SwUnleashedInc"
"

""If you appreciate the work done by the developer of BEEOK app, please do take sometime out to rate this app on Google Store and Occasionally click on Ads. :)" "

" "Liked our product? Help us keep our engines running, Donate a Coffee - https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=PEMRBXBFEFXW6"
New Android App -- Promo v1.0 (Promotion App) -- Newly Launched!!!

"Dear Friend," "

" "Hope this mail finds you in great health!!" "
""Your friend just used BEEOK to record voice calls (Uplink and Downlink both), take self voice-notes, block unwanted calls. We are sure you would like to give it a try as well." "

""Allow us to introduce BEEOK Android App. You are amongst first lucky few to have a preview of this useful app." "
" "You can find it on Google Play too. You can install it from Google Play store. Search for 'BEEOK' on Google PlayStore " "

""Here is the direct link to App, BEEOK , on Google Play Store." "

""Link (Absolutely Free App) : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.unleashed.android.beeokunleashed" "
""Hope to hear from you!!" "
""======================================" "
""Software Unleashed Inc." "
